title: Fix indentation of multiline messages in Terminal Logger with quiet verbosity.
body:
The multiline messages indentation processing implies that the message will appear in the structured view under the related project. 
That is not correct for the Quiet verbosity and for couple of other places, such as rendering the immediate message and cases when the project is not determined.

nodes.body:
This results in the following output:
![image](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/assets/67507805/bdf0e9df-ade9-40d8-b403-b0765837c8e2)

Proposed output:
![image](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/assets/67507805/c2033661-ee10-4a18-9390-99411ab5d13c)
